name: Game of Life (itch) (tm)
description:
An iteration of John Conway's Game of Life with some nice colors. Cells begin their life as red and fade to blue as they get older. You can use the mouse to create new life.

A mod of this project from a javidx9 video on Cellular Automata. Written in C++ using the wonderful olc Pixel Game Engine header file.

https://github.com/OneLoneCoder/olcPixelGameEngine/wiki
